start.instructions: Welcome to Terminal ESC. You are trapped in the depths of your system's terminal. Your job is to escape, but it will not be easy. The labryinth that is your system's terminal is filled with scary bugs, viruses and dangerous traps. Throughout these tunnels you will find weapons and goods to arm yourself. However, even armed, you are not safe from the choices you make.

option1.no: You decide to not escape your system's terminal. You survive for 3 days and starve to death since there is no food in your computer. GAME OVER
